statements: SELECT * FROM malware_forensics_data;
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size FROM malware_forensics_data;
SELECT * FROM malware_forensics_data ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM malware_forensics_data WHERE file_type = 'exe';
SELECT file_name, upload_date FROM malware_forensics_data WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT id, file_name, file_size, file_type, upload_date FROM malware_forensics_data WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT id, file_name, file_size FROM malware_forensics_data WHERE file_type = 'exe' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM malware_forensics_data WHERE file_name LIKE '%ransomware%' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM malware_forensics_data WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(file_type) AS file_type_count, AVG(file_size) AS avg_file_size FROM malware_forensics_data GROUP BY file_type HAVING avg_file_size > 5000 ORDER BY file_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM MalwareSamples WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT sample_id, file_name FROM MalwareSamples WHERE detection_status = TRUE;
SELECT file_name, file_size, md5_checksum FROM MalwareSamples ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM MalwareSamples WHERE file_name LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT report_id, analyzed_by, report_date FROM ForensicReports WHERE analysis_result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM MalwareSamples WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT file_name, file_size, md5_checksum FROM MalwareSamples WHERE detection_status = true;
SELECT sample_id, file_name, file_size, md5_checksum FROM MalwareSamples WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT sample_id, file_name, file_size, md5_checksum FROM MalwareSamples ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM ForensicReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM malware_files;
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size FROM malware_files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, scan_date FROM malware_files ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_type, scan_date FROM malware_files WHERE file_type = 'exe' ORDER BY scan_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_text, report_date FROM malware_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM malware_files;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM malware_files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM malware_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT file_name, report_text FROM malware_files JOIN malware_reports ON malware_files.id = malware_reports.file_id;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM malware_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM malware_samples;
SELECT file_hash, file_size FROM malware_samples WHERE detection_score > 0.8;
SELECT device_name FROM infected_devices ORDER BY last_seen DESC;
SELECT sample_id, device_id, analysis_results FROM forensic_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_role FROM analysts WHERE analyst_role = 'Senior Analyst';
SELECT * FROM malware_samples;
SELECT sample_id, file_hash, file_type FROM malware_samples WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY detection_score DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM infected_devices WHERE last_seen >= '2023-01-01' AND device_type = 'PC';
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_role FROM analysts WHERE analyst_role = 'Senior Analyst' OR analyst_role = 'Lead Analyst';
SELECT * FROM forensic_reports WHERE sample_id IN (SELECT sample_id FROM malware_samples WHERE detection_score > 0.8);
SELECT * FROM malware_reports;
SELECT report_id, malware_type FROM malware_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT sample_name, sample_hash FROM malware_samples WHERE sample_size > 1000;
SELECT ip_address, os_version FROM infected_machines ORDER BY last_infected_date DESC;
SELECT signature_text FROM malware_signatures WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM malware_reports WHERE malware_type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT report_date, malware_type FROM malware_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT sample_name, sample_hash FROM malware_samples WHERE sample_size > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT ip_address FROM infected_machines WHERE last_infected_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT signature_text, signature_type, created_date FROM malware_signatures WHERE signature_type = 'Trojan' ORDER BY created_date ASC;
